title: Close All Saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when I close all editors and then select Close All Saved from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: When I select Close All Saved from the file menu after closing all editors, all unsaved files should be closed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: use build 20020508 with the latest UI code, close all editors, create a new file named f1.txt, and then select Close All Saved from the file menu.
